Description: Found something interesting in the Ivory Archives, have you?
LevelDescriptionText: 1|You've found who lives in the depths of the archives.~2|You've found Scrimshander's first skeleton, and the history of the tower itself.
ChangeDescriptionText: 1|You remember fine tea and conversation in the depths of the Ivory Archives~2|You've uncovered the deepest history of Scrimshander
Name: Scrimshander: Ivory Archives: Historical Revelations
